Hibernian Wind Power a subsidiary of ESB, will develop the project.

ESB plans to develop or acquire offshore wind farms projects, commencing in 2018. The size of individual projects is expected to range between 200 MW and 500 MW, although some projects could be larger. The location of these initial offshore wind farms is expected to be in the Irish sea.
Floating Power Plant A/S and DP Energy Ireland Ltd will will develop project as a joint venture.
